abstract: On the literary reflection in antiquity, from Homer to Alexandrian philologists, and on the evolution of scholarly and critical ancient works
title: Poeti, eruditi e biografi. Momenti della riflessione dei Greci sulla letteratura

abstract: Proceedings of the conference held at the Accademia degli Agiati in Rovereto (20 October 2006) on issues related to ancient scholarly activity concerning Homer, Aristophanes, Plato, Aeschylus, Sophocles and Euripides
collection-title: Memorie della Accademia Roveretana degli Agiati
title: I classici greci e i loro commentatori. Dai papiri ai marginalia rinascimentali / Atti del convegno, Rovereto, 20 ottobre 2006
title-short: I classici greci e i loro commentatori

abstract: Commented edition of SH 958 and 969, followed by a historical reconstruction of the relationship between Galatians and Hellenistic kingdoms, with an introduction on the historical-encomiastic elegy in the Hellenistic age and its classification by Alexandrian scholars
title: Φάτις νικηφόρος. Frammenti di elegia encomiastica nell'età delle Guerre Galatiche: Supplementum Hellenisticum 958 e 969

abstract: Edition and commentary of fragments and ancient testimonies on the grammarian Philitas of Cos and his philological activity
collection-title: Quaderni dei Seminari Romani di Cultura Greca
title: Filita grammatico. Testimonianze e frammenti. Introduzione, edizione e commento
